wasmer/entities/function/env/
inner.rs

1use crate::{
2    AsStoreMut, AsStoreRef, FunctionEnv, FunctionEnvMut, StoreMut, StoreRef,
3    macros::backend::match_rt,
4};
5use std::{any::Any, marker::PhantomData};
6
7#[derive(Debug, derive_more::From)]
8/// An opaque reference to a function environment.
9/// The function environment data is owned by the `Store`.
10pub enum BackendFunctionEnv<T> {
11    #[cfg(feature = "sys")]
12    /// The function environment for the `sys` runtime.
13    Sys(crate::backend::sys::function::env::FunctionEnv<T>),
14    #[cfg(feature = "wamr")]
15    /// The function environment for the `wamr` runtime.
16    Wamr(crate::backend::wamr::function::env::FunctionEnv<T>),
17    #[cfg(feature = "wasmi")]
18    /// The function environment for the `wasmi` runtime.
19    Wasmi(crate::backend::wasmi::function::env::FunctionEnv<T>),
20    #[cfg(feature = "v8")]
21    /// The function environment for the `v8` runtime.
22    V8(crate::backend::v8::function::env::FunctionEnv<T>),
23    #[cfg(feature = "js")]
24    /// The function environment for the `js` runtime.
25    Js(crate::backend::js::function::env::FunctionEnv<T>),
26    #[cfg(feature = "jsc")]
27    /// The function environment for the `jsc` runtime.
28    Jsc(crate::backend::jsc::function::env::FunctionEnv<T>),
29}
30
31impl<T> Clone for BackendFunctionEnv<T> {
32    fn clone(&self) -> Self {
33        match self {
34            #[cfg(feature = "sys")]
35            Self::Sys(s) => Self::Sys(s.clone()),
36            #[cfg(feature = "wamr")]
37            Self::Wamr(s) => Self::Wamr(s.clone()),
38
39            #[cfg(feature = "wasmi")]
40            Self::Wasmi(s) => Self::Wasmi(s.clone()),
41            #[cfg(feature = "v8")]
42            Self::V8(s) => Self::V8(s.clone()),
43            #[cfg(feature = "js")]
44            Self::Js(s) => Self::Js(s.clone()),
45            #[cfg(feature = "jsc")]
46            Self::Jsc(s) => Self::Jsc(s.clone()),
47        }
48    }
49}
50
51impl<T> BackendFunctionEnv<T> {
52    /// Make a new FunctionEnv
53    pub fn new(store: &mut impl AsStoreMut, value: T) -> Self
54    where
55        T: Any + Send + 'static + Sized,
56    {
57        match store.as_store_mut().inner.store {
58            #[cfg(feature = "sys")]
59            crate::BackendStore::Sys(_) => Self::Sys(
60                crate::backend::sys::function::env::FunctionEnv::new(store, value),
61            ),
62            #[cfg(feature = "wamr")]
63            crate::BackendStore::Wamr(_) => Self::Wamr(
64                crate::backend::wamr::function::env::FunctionEnv::new(store, value),
65            ),
66
67            #[cfg(feature = "wasmi")]
68            crate::BackendStore::Wasmi(_) => Self::Wasmi(
69                crate::backend::wasmi::function::env::FunctionEnv::new(store, value),
70            ),
71
72            #[cfg(feature = "v8")]
73            crate::BackendStore::V8(_) => Self::V8(
74                crate::backend::v8::function::env::FunctionEnv::new(store, value),
75            ),
76
77            #[cfg(feature = "js")]
78            crate::BackendStore::Js(_) => Self::Js(
79                crate::backend::js::function::env::FunctionEnv::new(store, value),
80            ),
81            #[cfg(feature = "jsc")]
82            crate::BackendStore::Jsc(_) => Self::Jsc(
83                crate::backend::jsc::function::env::FunctionEnv::new(store, value),
84            ),
85        }
86    }
87
88    //#[allow(dead_code)] // This function is only used in js
89    //pub(crate) fn from_handle(handle: StoreHandle<VMFunctionEnvironment>) -> Self {
90    //    todo!()
91    //}
92
93    /// Get the data as reference
94    pub fn as_ref<'a>(&self, store: &'a impl AsStoreRef) -> &'a T
95    where
96        T: Any + Send + 'static + Sized,
97    {
98        match_rt!(on self => f {
99            f.as_ref(store)
100        })
101    }
102
103    /// Get the data as mutable
104    pub fn as_mut<'a>(&self, store: &'a mut impl AsStoreMut) -> &'a mut T
105    where
106        T: Any + Send + 'static + Sized,
107    {
108        match_rt!(on self => s {
109            s.as_mut(store)
110        })
111    }
112
113    /// Convert it into a `FunctionEnvMut`
114    pub fn into_mut(self, store: &mut impl AsStoreMut) -> FunctionEnvMut<'_, T>
115    where
116        T: Any + Send + 'static + Sized,
117    {
118        match_rt!(on self => f {
119            f.into_mut(store).into()
120        })
121    }
122}
123
124/// A temporary handle to a [`FunctionEnv`].
125#[derive(derive_more::From)]
126pub enum BackendFunctionEnvMut<'a, T: 'a> {
127    #[cfg(feature = "sys")]
128    /// The function environment for the `sys` runtime.
129    Sys(crate::backend::sys::function::env::FunctionEnvMut<'a, T>),
130    #[cfg(feature = "wamr")]
131    /// The function environment for the `wamr` runtime.
132    Wamr(crate::backend::wamr::function::env::FunctionEnvMut<'a, T>),
133
134    #[cfg(feature = "wasmi")]
135    /// The function environment for the `wasmi` runtime.
136    Wasmi(crate::backend::wasmi::function::env::FunctionEnvMut<'a, T>),
137    #[cfg(feature = "v8")]
138    /// The function environment for the `v8` runtime.
139    V8(crate::backend::v8::function::env::FunctionEnvMut<'a, T>),
140
141    #[cfg(feature = "js")]
142    /// The function environment for the `js` runtime.
143    Js(crate::backend::js::function::env::FunctionEnvMut<'a, T>),
144
145    #[cfg(feature = "jsc")]
146    /// The function environment for the `jsc` runtime.
147    Jsc(crate::backend::jsc::function::env::FunctionEnvMut<'a, T>),
148}
149
150impl<T: Send + 'static> BackendFunctionEnvMut<'_, T> {
151    /// Returns a reference to the host state in this function environement.
152    pub fn data(&self) -> &T {
153        match_rt!(on self => f {
154            f.data()
155        })
156    }
157
158    /// Returns a mutable- reference to the host state in this function environement.
159    pub fn data_mut(&mut self) -> &mut T {
160        match_rt!(on self => f {
161            f.data_mut()
162        })
163    }
164
165    /// Borrows a new immmutable reference
166    pub fn as_ref(&self) -> FunctionEnv<T> {
167        match self {
168            #[cfg(feature = "sys")]
169            Self::Sys(f) => BackendFunctionEnv::Sys(f.as_ref()).into(),
170            #[cfg(feature = "wamr")]
171            Self::Wamr(f) => BackendFunctionEnv::Wamr(f.as_ref()).into(),
172            #[cfg(feature = "wasmi")]
173            Self::Wasmi(f) => BackendFunctionEnv::Wasmi(f.as_ref()).into(),
174            #[cfg(feature = "v8")]
175            Self::V8(f) => BackendFunctionEnv::V8(f.as_ref()).into(),
176            #[cfg(feature = "js")]
177            Self::Js(f) => BackendFunctionEnv::Js(f.as_ref()).into(),
178            #[cfg(feature = "jsc")]
179            Self::Jsc(f) => BackendFunctionEnv::Jsc(f.as_ref()).into(),
180        }
181    }
182
183    /// Borrows a new mutable reference
184    pub fn as_mut(&mut self) -> FunctionEnvMut<'_, T> {
185        match self {
186            #[cfg(feature = "sys")]
187            Self::Sys(f) => BackendFunctionEnvMut::Sys(f.as_mut()).into(),
188            #[cfg(feature = "wamr")]
189            Self::Wamr(f) => BackendFunctionEnvMut::Wamr(f.as_mut()).into(),
190            #[cfg(feature = "wasmi")]
191            Self::Wasmi(f) => BackendFunctionEnvMut::Wasmi(f.as_mut()).into(),
192            #[cfg(feature = "v8")]
193            Self::V8(f) => BackendFunctionEnvMut::V8(f.as_mut()).into(),
194            #[cfg(feature = "js")]
195            Self::Js(f) => BackendFunctionEnvMut::Js(f.as_mut()).into(),
196            #[cfg(feature = "jsc")]
197            Self::Jsc(f) => BackendFunctionEnvMut::Jsc(f.as_mut()).into(),
198        }
199    }
200
201    /// Borrows a new mutable reference of both the attached Store and host state
202    pub fn data_and_store_mut(&mut self) -> (&mut T, StoreMut<'_>) {
203        match_rt!(on self => f {
204            f.data_and_store_mut()
205        })
206    }
207}
208
209impl<T> AsStoreRef for BackendFunctionEnvMut<'_, T> {
210    fn as_store_ref(&self) -> StoreRef<'_> {
211        match_rt!(on &self => f {
212            f.as_store_ref()
213        })
214    }
215}
216
217impl<T> AsStoreMut for BackendFunctionEnvMut<'_, T> {
218    fn as_store_mut(&mut self) -> StoreMut<'_> {
219        match_rt!(on self => s {
220            s.as_store_mut()
221        })
222    }
223
224    fn objects_mut(&mut self) -> &mut crate::StoreObjects {
225        match_rt!(on self => s {
226            s.objects_mut()
227        })
228    }
229}
230
231impl<T> std::fmt::Debug for BackendFunctionEnvMut<'_, T>
232where
233    T: Send + std::fmt::Debug + 'static,
234{
235    fn fmt(&self, f: &mut std::fmt::Formatter<'_>) -> std::fmt::Result {
236        match_rt!(on self => s {
237            write!(f, "{s:?}")
238        })
239    }
240}
